metadata.title: CVE-2022-39837 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Connected Vehicle Systems Alliance (COVESA)dlt-daemon through 2.18.8. Due to a faulty DLT file parser, a crafted DLTfile that crashes the process can be created. This is due to missingvalidation checks. There is a NULL pointer dereference,

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
